definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: swallow (liquids), (NH id.; cf. Aram. [[גְּמָא]], [[גְּמַע]], gma9; perh. cf. also Eth. gm9e: jar, vessel v. Di)—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְגַמֶּא־אֶרֶץ]] Job 39:24 fig. of horse in swift gallop; (this, however, possibly denom. fr. [[גּוּמָּא]] NH, Aram. [[גּוּמְּתָא]], guwmto0 pit, hollow, i.e. he makes [paws or stamps] hollows in the earth).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Imv. fs. sf. [[הַגְמִיאִינִי נׇא מְעַט־מַיִם]] Ge 24:17 let me drink a little water, pray.
